data.title: Quest Acquires Quadrotech to Strengthen Microsoft 365 / Office 365 Solutions
data.meta_description: Today we announced that Quest is officially acquiring Quadrotech , one of the leading providers of Microsoft 365 / Office 365 migration and management since 2011. The acquisition reinforces our relentless commitment to being the go-to ISV in the Micro...
data.text:
Today we announced that Quest is officially acquiring Quadrotech, one of the leading providers of Microsoft 365 / Office 365 migration and management since 2011. The acquisition reinforces our relentless commitment to being the go-to ISV in the Microsoft ecosystem. Quadrotech will join our Microsoft Platform Management Team, which as you know also includes the recently acquired Binary Tree portfolio. Combined, Quest will bring together the best solutions in the marketplace to give you a single, go-to partner to conquer any Microsoft challenges.

The acquisition of Quadrotech will enable Quest to better serve channel partners and MSPs who are supporting large, complex and multi-tenant environments for their customers. Quadrotech Nova provides advanced multi-tenant management capabilities along with integrated reporting, license lifecycle management, delegation and service quality monitoring to give you complete visibility and control when managing multiple Office 365 environments.

Additionally, Quest and Quadrotech have partnered closely for more than five years to help organizations migrate email archive and PST environments. Our strong relationship will enable a seamless integration as the two migration leaders come together to help you deliver any and all migration projects for your customers.

Moving forward, the Quest Partner Circle will continue to operate business as usual while we work on integrating Quadrotech into the Quest family. Stay tuned for additional information on this exciting news, including support options, partner program updates and more.

To learn more, please read the full press release.

We appreciate your continued support!
